title: Which is the best IPU college in Greater Noida? - Quora

response.answer_text: In Greater Noida there are about many colleges which are affiliated to GGSIP University . So , when a student is doing their research for choosing the right and the best college - certain points should be kept in mind . Resources and facilities provided by the college.Reputation of College.Faculty of the college.CampusPlacement and Internship opportunities.Fee structureLocationWith keeping all the above points in view , i would suggest KCC Institute of Legal and Higher Education , Greater Noida to those students who wants to pursue their studies in bcom, bba , Bjmc , BCA . It is considered as an ‘A’ Grade college under IPU and comes under demanding colleges when counselling rounds of IPU is conducted . Students sometimes also prefer to take admissions through Management Quota (Direct admissions) like one of my friend did . Although seats for direct admissions are limited (10%). When it comes to resources and facilities by college , then KCCILHE is brillient -it is built on a sprawling 40 acres campus in Knowledge Park 3 , near Pari Chowk and AUTO EXPO . You will find all you need in campus , for instance - E-library, Communication Lab, Auditorium , Seminar and lecture halls, Conference and Tutorial rooms ,IT Labs loaded with latest branded computers and technologies( like microsoft , Autodesk , Cisco ) Sports complex, Cafeteria, Hostel , Transportation etc. When it comes to teaching and faculty - the institute applies balanced blend of classroom curriculum and practical approach. In extension to the traditional classroom teaching , number of other methods like - case study learning , web based learning , role playing , quiz and debates , seminars and presentation are used for an effective learning . Institute also has a rich pool of faculty with leadership experience and profound industry experience. A dedicated placement cell helps students in meeting their expectations of getting a good job in reputed companies of their field . College has good relations with companies and internship is also provided by the college itself in organisations like UTV, Network 18, Bajaj capital, Yes bank, LG, Bharti etc. Apart from arranging placement , this cell also works towards regular interaction with the industry , organizing visits and guest lectures , workshops and seminars. Last but not least - fee structure of the college is pretty affordable around 60,000 INR per year. Contact on their website for accurate fee info .    Hope this answer will help you. GOOD LUCK.
